about_the_game:
👷🏻『 F E A T U R E S 』👷🏻

🔸 Super Polished

The game was in Early Access for five months and during that time we made a number of improvements, added functionalities, and a new warehouse and forklifts. All in four big updates (details of which can be found in the events & announcements section).

🔹 Career Mode

Enjoy a career mode that allows you to visit three warehouses and check warehouse yards, and use the money you earn to repair your forklift, buy new forklifts and paint them in your favorite color.

🔸 Arcade Mode

Jump into Arcade Mode and have fun like no one ever! Thanks to the Make a Mess mode, you can spread loads without consequences and act completely opposite to a professional forklift operator.

🔹 Steering wheels, pedals, gamepad

Play as you like: with the steering wheel; a gamepad; with a mouse and keyboard; or by immersing yourself entirely via VR headgear. In addition, in (the beta version), we also support connecting VR with a non-VR controller of your choice!

🔸 High Replayability

Unlock special missions with payloads appearing in random places so the fun with Best Forklift Operator never ends.

🔹 Community and Point Shop Items

Best Forklift Operator also supports Point Shop & Community Items! With animated avatars, backgrounds, emoticons, trading cards, and more!

🔸 Steam API supported

Earn Steam Achievements and prove you're the best in Leaderboards.

🔹 Support for every major VR headgear

Full support for Oculus Quest 1 & 2, HTC Vive+Wands, and Valve Index+Knuckles!

🔸 Non-VR and VR

Feeling the heat of working in a warehouse. The game allows you to play in a standard mode (flat screen and with a selected controller), or on VR goggles.

📦『 S U M M A R Y 』📦

📌 Best Forklift Operator is a unique game about driving a forklift - a vehicle without which world trade and logistics would stop. You can experience the challenges of a forklift operator by playing as you like: on a gamepad, steering wheel, with a mouse and keyboard, or by running the game on VR headgear.

📌 Take the training and show that you are ready for the challenges. Complete tasks fast and precisely, earn money and become the king of warehouses, yards, loading, and unloading. Just be careful not to damage your equipment or products, if this happens your wallet will quickly become empty!

📌 The game features a combination of faithful simulation and entertainment that forklift fans have been waiting for for a long time. This is evidenced by the Arcade mode, where you can express yourself and make a big mess in the warehouse - and best of all, instead of punishment, you get a reward for it!

📌 Best Forklift Operator is a game created with the community and with a lot of dedication. The changes that the project has undergone can be checked in the update list. Currently, it is a challenging, interesting game that literally everyone can enjoy. This title shows how great the potential of forklifts is. If you are looking for digital Zen, you will find it here!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to the world of warehouses, transport, and forklifts. Join us and show that you deserve to be called the best forklift operator.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
